description: Have you ever wanted to learn how to make music? Thanks to technology it has never been easier. In this course you will learn how to compose your very own song in Garage Band. This isn't just a simple how to course, this is a course that shows you the ins and outs of songwriting in one jam packed hour. Learn the secrets behind baselines, drum beats and melodies. I want you to compose a song and show it to all of your friends!
title: Learn how to make a song in GarageBand in 1 hour
